title: Hello! How can I help you today?
Which product would you like to know about?
Let me tell you about our services.
We have the latest smartphones available. Would you like me to send you a catalog?
We offer a wide range of computers for both business and personal use.
Our monthly plans start from $10. I can send you detailed pricing information.
We provide 24/7 customer support to assist you whenever you need help.
